2 Structure Shiny apps are contained in a single script called app.R. The structure can be broken into three parts: User interface object. The user interface (ui) object controls the layout and appearance of your app. Server function. The server function contains the instructions that your computer needs to build your app shinyApp function. The shinyApp function creates Shiny app objects from an explicit UI/server pair. The script app.R can live in a directory such as newdir/) or run with runApp("newdir").
